locale.name: ru
locale.long: This key specifies the hour format used by the clock applet. Possible values are "12-hour", "24-hour", "internet", "unix" and "custom". If set to "internet", the clock will display Internet time. The Internet time system divides the day into 1000 ".beats". There are no time zones in this system, so time is the same all over the world. If set to "unix", the clock will display time in seconds since Epoch, i.e. 1970-01-01. If set to "custom", the clock will display time according to the format specified in the custom_format key.

locale.name: C

locale.long: This value determines what files get filtered from the file browser. Valid values are: none (filter nothing), hidden (filter hidden files), binary (filter binary files) and hidden_and_binary (filter both hidden and binary files).

locale.long: The filter pattern to filter the file browser with. This filter works on top of the filter_mode.

locale.name: C
locale.long: If TRUE the file browser plugin will view the directory of the first opened document given that the file browser hasn't been used yet. (Thus this generally applies to opening a document from the command line or opening it with nautilus etc)

locale.name: ru
locale.long: A custom font that will be used for the editing area. This will only take effect if the "Use Default Font" option is turned off.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Whether to use the system's default fixed width font for editing text instead of a font specific to gedit. If this option is turned off, then the font named in the "Editor Font" option will be used instead of the system font.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Whether gedit should display line numbers in the editing area.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Whether gedit should display the right margin in the editing area.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Указывает положение правой границы.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Whether gedit should automatically save modified files after a time interval. You can set the time interval with the "Auto Save Interval" option.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Number of minutes after which gedit will automatically save modified files. This will only take effect if the "Auto Save" option is turned on.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Extension or suffix to use for backup file names. This will only take effect if the "Create Backup Copies" option is turned on.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Whether gedit should create backup copies for the files it saves. You can set the backup file extension with the "Backup Copy Extension" option.

locale.name: C
locale.long: List of VFS schemes gedit supports in write mode. The 'file' scheme is writable by default.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Должен ли gedit подсвечивать все найденные при поиске совпадения.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Specifies how the cursor moves when the HOME and END keys are pressed. Use "DISABLED" to always move at the start/end of the line, "AFTER" to move to the start/end of the line the first time the keys are pressed and to the start/end of the text ignoring whitespaces the second time the keys are pressed, "BEFORE" to move to the start/end of the text before moving to the start/end of the line and "ALWAYS" to always move to the start/end of the text instead of the start/end of the line.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Следует ли вставлять пробелы вместо табуляций.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Specifies the number of spaces that should be displayed instead of Tab characters.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Maximum number of actions that gedit will be able to undo or redo. Use "-1" for unlimited number of actions.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Maximum number of actions that gedit will be able to undo or redo. Use "-1" for unlimited number of actions. Deprecated since 2.12.0

locale.name: C
locale.long: Specifies how to wrap long lines in the editing area. Use "GTK_WRAP_NONE" for no wrapping, "GTK_WRAP_WORD" for wrapping at word boundaries, and "GTK_WRAP_CHAR" for wrapping at individual character boundaries. Note that the values are case-sensitive, so make sure they appear exactly as mentioned here.

locale.name: ru
locale.long: Sorted list of encodings used by gedit for auto-detecting the encoding of a file. "CURRENT" represents the current locale encoding. Only recognized encodings are used.

locale.name: ru
locale.long: List of encodings shown in Character Coding menu in open/save file selector. Only recognized encodings are used.

locale.name: ru
locale.long: Specifies the font to use for a document's body when printing documents.

locale.name: ru
locale.long: Specifies the font to use for page headers when printing a document. This will only take effect if the "Print Header" option is turned on.

locale.name: ru
locale.long: Specifies the font to use for line numbers when printing. This will only take effect if the "Print Line Numbers" option is non-zero.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Whether gedit should include a document header when printing documents.

locale.name: C
locale.long: If this value is 0, then no line numbers will be inserted when printing a document. Otherwise, gedit will print line numbers every such number of lines.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Whether gedit should print syntax highlighting when printing documents.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Specifies how to wrap long lines for printing. Use "GTK_WRAP_NONE" for no wrapping, "GTK_WRAP_WORD" for wrapping at word boundaries, and "GTK_WRAP_CHAR" for wrapping at individual character boundaries. Note that the values are case-sensitive, so make sure they appear exactly as mentioned here.

locale.name: C

locale.name: C

locale.name: C
locale.long: Style for the toolbar buttons. Possible values are "GEDIT_TOOLBAR_SYSTEM" to use the system's default style, "GEDIT_TOOLBAR_ICONS" to display icons only, "GEDIT_TOOLBAR_ICONS_AND_TEXT" to display both icons and text, and "GEDIT_TOOLBAR_ICONS_BOTH_HORIZ" to display prioritized text beside icons. Note that the values are case-sensitive, so make sure they appear exactly as mentioned here.

locale.long: Оставшееся время работы на батарее в секундах, когда выполняется критическое действие. Действительно только в случае, когда установлен параметр use_time_for_policy.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Оставшееся время работы на батарее в секундах, воспринимаемое как критическое. Действительно только в случае, когда установлен параметр use_time_for_policy.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Оставшееся время работы на батарее в секундах, воспринимаемое как низкое. Действительно только в случае, когда установлен параметр use_time_for_policy.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Ожидать перехода в спящий режим при питании от сети
locale.long: Сколько секунд компьютер должен простаивать при питании от сети перед приостановкой.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Время перехода в сон при питании от батареи
locale.long: Сколько секунд компьютер должен простаивать при питании от батарей перед приостановкой.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Задержка приостановки компьютера при питании UPS
locale.long: Сколько секунд компьютер должен простаивать перед приостановкой при питании от UPS.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Время перехода в сон при питании от сети
locale.long: Время бездействия в секундах, по истечении которого дисплей будет отключён при работе от сети.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Время выключения экрана при питании от батареи
locale.long: Сколько секунд компьютер должен простаивать при питании от батарей перед отключением дисплея.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Задержка отключения дисплея при питании от UPS
locale.long: Сколько секунд компьютер должен простаивать перед отключением дисплея при питании от UPS.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Должны ли использоваться звуковые уведомления для извещения о низком уровне батарей или о том, что блокирующие запросы остановили запланированное действие.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Параметры отображения значка уведомления. Возможные значения: «never», «low», «critical», «charge», «present» и «always».

locale.name: C
locale.short: Разрешить переход в ждущий и спящий режимы из меню
locale.long: Должны ли быть разрешены параметры «Ждущий режим» и «Спящий режим» в выпадающем меню области уведомления.

locale.name: C
locale.long: The number of minutes to run before changing the screensaver theme.

locale.name: C
locale.long: The command that will be run, if the "embedded_keyboard_enabled" key is set to TRUE, to embed a keyboard widget into the window. This command should implement an XEMBED plug interface and output a window XID on the standard output.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Set this to TRUE to allow embedding a keyboard into the window when trying to unlock. The "keyboard_command" key must be set with the appropriate command.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Set this to TRUE to activate the screensaver when the session is idle.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Интервал неактивности, по истечении которого сеанс считается простаивающим.
locale.long: The number of minutes of inactivity before the session is considered idle.

locale.name: C
locale.long: The number of minutes after screensaver activation before locking the screen.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Theme to use for the lock dialog.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Set this to TRUE to lock the screen when the screensaver goes active.

locale.name: C
locale.long: The command to invoke when the logout button is clicked. This command should simply log the user out without any interaction. This key has effect only if the "logout_enable" key is set to TRUE.

locale.name: C
locale.long: The number of minutes after the screensaver activation before a logout option will appear in unlock dialog. This key has effect only if the "logout_enable" key is set to TRUE.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Set this to TRUE to offer an option in unlock dialog to logging out after a delay. The Delay is specified in the "logout_delay" key.

locale.name: C
locale.long: The selection mode used by screensaver. May be "blank-only" to enable the screensaver without using any theme on activation, "single" to enable screensaver using only one theme on activation (specified in "themes" key), and "random" to enable the screensaver using a random theme on activation.

locale.name: C
locale.long: The number of seconds of inactivity before signalling to power-management. This key is set and maintained by the session power-management agent.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Allow the session status message to be displayed when the screen is locked.

locale.name: C
locale.long: This key specifies the list of themes to be used by the screensaver. It's ignored when "mode" key is "blank-only", should provide the theme name when "mode" is "single", and should provide a list of themes when "mode" is "random".

locale.name: C
locale.long: Set this to TRUE to offer an option in the unlock dialog to switch to a different user account.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Effect to add to the outside of a border. Possible values are "shadow", "none", and "border".

locale.name: C
locale.long: Число секунд, которое будет ожидаться до того, как будет сделан снимок экрана.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Включить рамку оконного менеджера в снимок окна.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Включает указатель мыши в снимок экрана

locale.name: C
locale.long: Каталог, в котором был сохранен последний снимок.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Grab just the current window, rather than the whole desktop. This key has been deprecated and it is no longer in use.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Этот ключ определяет порядок столбцов результатов поиска и не должен определяться пользователем.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Этот ключ определяет высоту окна и используется для запоминания размера окна поиска между сеансами. Если установить значение -1, будет использоваться высота по умолчанию.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Этот ключ определяет, будет ли утилита поиска запускаться максимизированной на весь экран.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Этот ключ определяет ширину окна и используется для запоминания размера окна поиска между сеансами. Если установить значение -1, будет использоваться ширина по умолчанию.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Этот ключ определяет, отключено ли использование команды locate для выполнения простых поисков имён файлов.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Этот ключ определяет, отключено ли использование команды find после быстрого поиска.

locale.name: C
locale.long: This key defines the default value of the "Look in Folder" widget.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Этот ключ определяет пути, которые будут исключены из быстрого поиска. Поддерживаются шаблоны «*» и «?». Значения по умолчанию /mnt/*, /media/*, /dev/*, /tmp/*, /proc/* и /var/*.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Пути, исключённые из второго прохода быстрого поиска
locale.long: Этот ключ определяет пути, которые утилита поиска будет исключать при втором проходе. Второй проход использует команду "find" для поиска файлов. Цель второго прохода - найти файлы, которые не были проиндексированы. Подерживаются шаблоны '*' и '?'. Значение по умолчанию - /.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Этот ключ определяет, разворачивать ли раздел дополнительных параметров при запуске средства поиска.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Этот ключ определяет, будет ли выбран параметр «Содержит текст» при запуске средства поиска.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Устанавливать параметр поиска «Дата изменения меньше, чем»
locale.long: Этот ключ определяет, будет ли выбран параметр «Дата изменения меньше, чем» при запуске средства поиска.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Устанавливать параметр поиска «Дата изменения больше, чем»
locale.long: Этот ключ определяет, будет ли выбран параметр «Дата изменения больше, чем» при запуске средства поиска.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Select the search option "Exclude other filesystems"
locale.long: This key determines if the "Exclude other filesystems" search option is selected when the search tool is started.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Этот ключ определяет, будет ли выбран параметр «Файл пуст» при запуске средства поиска.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Устанавливать параметр поиска «Следовать по символьным ссылкам»
locale.long: Этот ключ определяет, будет ли выбран параметр «Следовать по символьным ссылкам» при запуске средства поиска.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Этот ключ определяет, будет ли установлен параметр «Имя не содержит» при запуске средства поиска.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Устанавливать параметр поиска «Имя совпадает с регулярным выражением»
locale.long: Этот ключ определяет, будет ли установлен параметр «Имя совпадает с регулярным выражением» при запуске средства поиска.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Этот ключ определяет, будет ли установлен параметр «Принадлежит группе» при запуске средства поиска.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Этот ключ определяет, будет ли установлен параметр «Принадлежит пользователю» при запуске средства поиска.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Этот ключ определяет, будет ли установлен параметр «Владелец не определён» при запуске средства поиска.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Устанавливать параметр поиска "Показывать скрытые файлы и каталоги"
locale.long: Этот ключ определяет, должен ли быть установлен параметр «Показывать скрытые файлы и папки» при запуске средства поиска.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Этот ключ определяет, будет ли установлен параметр «Размер не менее» при запуске средства поиска.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Этот ключ определяет, будет ли установлен параметр «Размер не более» при запуске средства поиска.

locale.name: C
locale.long: If enabled, gnome-session will save the session automatically. Otherwise, the logout dialog will have an option to save the session.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Если включено, выдавать предупреждение перед окончанием сеанса.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Предпочитаемое изображение для экрана входа в систему
locale.long: This is a relative path value based off the $datadir/pixmaps/ directory. Sub-directories and image names are valid values. Changing this value will effect the next session login.

locale.name: ru
locale.long: Стиль панели управления. Допустимые значения: "Оба","Оба гориз.", "Пиктограммы" и "Текст".

locale.name: C
locale.short: Размер шрифта, используемого для отображения журналов
locale.long: Specifies the size of the fixed-width font used to display the log in the main tree view. The default is taken from the default terminal font size.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Высота основгого окна программы в пикселах
locale.long: Specifies the height of the log viewer main window in pixels.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Specifies the log file displayed at startup. The default is either /var/adm/messages or /var/log/messages, depending on your operating system.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Specifies a list of log files to open up at startup. A default list is created by reading /etc/syslog.conf.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Specifies the width of the log viewer main window in pixels.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Показывать все группы и всех пользователей в программе настройки пользователей

locale.name: ru
locale.long: A subset of possible encodings are presented in the Encoding submenu. This is a list of encodings to appear there. The special encoding name "current" means to display the encoding of the current locale.

locale.name: C

locale.long: Whether to ask for confirmation when closing a terminal window which has more than one open tab.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Profile to be used when opening a new window or tab. Must be in profile_list.

locale.name: C
locale.long: List of profiles known to gnome-terminal. The list contains strings naming subdirectories relative to /apps/gnome-terminal/profiles.

locale.name: C

locale.long: Normally you can access the menubar with F10. This can also be customized via gtkrc (gtk-menu-bar-accel = "whatever"). This option allows the standard menubar accelerator to be disabled.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Имеет ли панель меню клавиши доступа
locale.long: Whether to have Alt+letter access keys for the menubar. They may interfere with some applications run inside the terminal so it's possible to turn them off.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Keyboard shortcut key for closing a tab. Expressed as a string in the same format used for GTK+ resource files. If you set the option to the special string "disabled", then there will be no keyboard shortcut for this action.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Keyboard shortcut key for closing a window. Expressed as a string in the same format used for GTK+ resource files. If you set the option to the special string "disabled", then there will be no keyboard shortcut for this action.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Keyboard shortcut key for copying selected text to the clipboard. Expressed as a string in the same format used for GTK+ resource files. If you set the option to the special string "disabled", then there will be no keyboard shortcut for this action.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Комбинация клавиш для отделения текущей вкладки.

locale.name: C
locale.long: A value between 0.0 and 1.0 indicating how much to darken the background image. 0.0 means no darkness, 1.0 means fully dark. In the current implementation, there are only two levels of darkness possible, so the setting behaves as a boolean, where 0.0 disables the darkening effect.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Filename of a background image.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Type of terminal background. May be "solid" for a solid color, "image" for an image, or "transparent" for either real transparency if a compositing window manager is running, or pseudo-transparency otherwise.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Sets what code the backspace key generates. Possible values are "ascii-del" for the ASCII DEL character, "control-h" for Control-H (AKA the ASCII BS character), "escape-sequence" for the escape sequence typically bound to backspace or delete. "ascii-del" is normally considered the correct setting for the Backspace key.

locale.name: C
locale.long: The possible values are "system" to use the global cursor blinking settings, or "on" or "off" to set the mode explicitly.

locale.name: C
locale.long: The possible values are "block" to use a block cursor, "ibeam" to use a vertical line cursor, or "underline" to use an underline cursor.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Run this command in place of the shell, if use_custom_command is true.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Отображать ли меню в новых окнах/вкладках
locale.long: True if the menubar should be shown in new windows, for windows/tabs with this profile.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Sets what code the delete key generates. Possible values are "ascii-del" for the ASCII DEL character, "control-h" for Control-H (AKA the ASCII BS character), "escape-sequence" for the escape sequence typically bound to backspace or delete. "escape-sequence" is normally considered the correct setting for the Delete key.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Что делать с терминалом после завершения дочерней команды
locale.long: Possible values are "close" to close the terminal, and "restart" to restart the command.

locale.name: C
locale.long: An Pango font name. Examples are "Sans 12" or "Monospace Bold 14".

locale.name: C
locale.short: Цвет текста в терминале по умолчанию
locale.long: Default color of text in the terminal, as a color specification (can be HTML-style hex digits, or a color name such as "red").

locale.name: C
locale.long: Icon to use for tabs/windows containing this profile.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Запускать ли команду в терминале как регистрационную оболочку (login shell)
locale.long: If true, the command inside the terminal will be launched as a login shell. (argv[0] will have a hyphen in front of it.)

locale.name: C
locale.long: Terminals have a 16-color palette that applications inside the terminal can use. This is that palette, in the form of a colon-separated list of color names. Color names should be in hex format e.g. "#FF00FF"

locale.name: C
locale.long: If true, scroll the background image with the foreground text; if false, keep the image in a fixed position and scroll the text above it.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Прокручивать ли окно вниз при нажатии клавиши
locale.long: If true, pressing a key jumps the scrollbar to the bottom.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Прокручивать ли вниз при появлении нового вывода
locale.long: If true, whenever there's new output the terminal will scroll to the bottom.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Number of scrollback lines to keep around. You can scroll back in the terminal by this number of lines; lines that don't fit in the scrollback are discarded. Be careful with this setting; it's the primary factor in determining how much memory the terminal will use.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Where to put the terminal scrollbar. Possibilities are "left", "right", and "disabled".

locale.name: C
locale.long: If true, don't make a noise when applications send the escape sequence for the terminal bell.

locale.name: ru
locale.long: Title to display for the terminal window or tab. This title may be replaced by or combined with the title set by the application inside the terminal, depending on the title_mode setting.

locale.name: C
locale.long: If the application in the terminal sets the title (most typically people have their shell set up to do this), the dynamically-set title can erase the configured title, go before it, go after it, or replace it. The possible values are "replace", "before", "after", and "ignore".

locale.name: C
locale.short: Обновлять ли utmp/wtmp при запуске команды терминала
locale.long: If true, the system login records utmp and wtmp will be updated when the command inside the terminal is launched.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Запускать ли другую команду вместо оболочки
locale.long: If true, the value of the custom_command setting will be used in place of running a shell.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Popup a dialog when an S/Key challenge response query is detected and clicked on. Typing a password into the dialog will send it to the terminal.

locale.name: C
locale.long: If true, the terminal will use the desktop-global standard font if it's monospace (and the most similar font it can come up with otherwise).

locale.name: C
locale.short: Использовать ли шрифт из текущей темы для объекта терминала
locale.long: If true, the theme color scheme used for text entry boxes will be used for the terminal, instead of colors provided by the user.

locale.name: ru
locale.long: Human-readable name of the profile.

locale.name: C
locale.long: When selecting text by word, sequences of these characters are considered single words. Ranges can be given as "A-Z". Literal hyphen (not expressing a range) should be the first character given.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Шаг изменения громкости в процентах.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Модули GTK+ для поддержки специальных возможностей
locale.long: This key determines the GTK+ modules to load for accessibility support.

locale.name: ru
locale.short: Предупреждать при экспортировании в формат поддерживающий только один лист
locale.long: Некоторые форматы файлов могут содержать только один лист. Эта отметка определяет будет ли пользователь предупреждён в том случае, когда будет сохранён только один лист из многостраничной рабочей книги.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Which direction pressing Enter will move the edit position.

locale.name: ru
locale.long: Эта переменная определяет будет ли выполняться немедленная прокрутка или отложенная.

locale.name: ru
locale.long: Если "задержка" равна 0, gnumeric пересчитывает все выражения немедленно после каждого изменения. Значения отличные от 0 позволяют gnumeric накопить больше изменений до каждого пересчёта. Если "задержка" положительная, то после любого изменения gnumeric ждёт указанное число миллисекунд и затем пересчитывает выражения. Если в этот период произойдут какие-то дополнительные изменения, то они тоже будут обработаны в этот момент. Если значение "задержки" отрицательное, используется модуль её значения.

locale.name: ru
locale.long: Эта переменная определяет будут ли включены клавиши переходов. Клавиши переходов -- это возврат к обработке клавиатурных комбинаций в стиле Lotus 1-2-3. Они превращают нажатие "Ctrl-стрелка" в сдвиг страницы вместо перехода в начало/конец серии.

locale.name: ru
locale.long: Разрешение экрана по горизонтали.

locale.name: ru
locale.long: Разрешение экрана по вертикали.

locale.name: ru
locale.long: Эта переменная определяет будет ли видна при запуске панель форматирования.

locale.name: ru
locale.long: Эта переменная определяет где будет отображаться панель форматирования. 0 - слева, 1 - справа, 2 - сверху.

locale.name: ru
locale.long: Эта переменная определяет будет ли видна при запуске панель графических объектов.

locale.name: ru
locale.long: Эта переменная определяет где будет отображаться панель графических объектов. 0 - слева, 1 - справа, 2 - сверху.

locale.name: ru
locale.long: Эта переменная определяет будет ли видна при запуске стандартная панель.

locale.name: ru
locale.long: Эта переменная определяет где будет отображаться стандартная панель. 0 - слева, 1 - справа, 2 - сверху.

locale.name: ru
locale.long: Это число (между 0.25 и 1.00) определяет какую часть экрана по-горизонтали будет занимать окно по умолчанию.

locale.name: ru
locale.long: Это число (между 0.25 и 1.00) определяет какую часть экрана по-вертикали будет занимать окно по умолчанию.

locale.name: ru
locale.long: Исходный масштаб для новых книг.

locale.name: ru
locale.long: Этот параметр определяет исходное состояние кнопки порядка сортировки в диалоге сортировки.

locale.name: ru
locale.long: Установка этого параметра приведёт к тому, что при сортировке с помощью кнопки на панели инструментов будет производиться сортировка с учётом регистра символов. Соответствующим образом будет определяться исходное состояние переключателя "Сортировка с учётом регистра" в диалоге сортировки.

locale.name: ru
locale.long: Установка этого параметра приведёт к тому, что при сортировке с помощью кнопки на панели инструментов будет сохраняться форматирование ячеек. Соответствующим образом будет определяться исходное состояние поля отметки "Сохранять форматирование при сортировке" в диалоге сортировки.

locale.name: C
locale.long: When selecting a sort region in the sort dialog, search clauses are automatically added. This number determines the maximum number of clauses to be added automatically.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Default Number of columns in a sheet
locale.long: The number of columns in each sheet. This setting will be used only in a new gnumeric session. Whatever value is given here, the real number of columns will be a power of 2 between 256 and 4096.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Default Number of rows in a sheet
locale.long: The number of rows in each sheet. This setting will be used only in a new gnumeric session. Whatever value is given here, the real number of rows will be a power of 2 between 65539 and 16777216.

locale.name: ru
locale.long: Исходное число листов для новых книг.

locale.name: ru
locale.short: Уровень сжатия файлов Gnumeric по умолчанию
locale.long: Это число (между 0 и 9) указывает степень сжатия используемую gnumeric при сохранении файлов в исходном формате. 0 -- без компрессии, 9 -- максимальное сжатие.

locale.name: ru
locale.long: When TRUE, Gnumeric will prefer the modern CLIPBOARD selection over the legacy PRIMARY selections. Set to FALSE if you have to deal with older applications, like Xterm or Emacs, which set only the PRIMARY selection.

locale.name: ru
locale.long: Некоторые диалоги содержат только одно поле ввода допускающее указание выделенного диапазона в рабочей книге. Установка значений этой переменной в TRUE (истина) направляет выделение в это поле даже если поле не имеет фокуса ввода.

locale.name: ru
locale.long: Диалог выбора функций сохраняет список ранее использовавшихся функций. Это максимальная длина списка.

locale.name: ru
locale.long: Диалог выбора функций сохраняет список ранее использовавшихся функций. Вот этот список.

locale.name: ru
locale.short: Использовать UTF-8 при экспорте в LaTeX
locale.long: Эта отметка определяет будут ли создаваемые файлы LaTeX использовать кодировку UTF-8 (юникод) или ISO-8859-1 (Latin-1). Чтобы использовать файлы UTF-8, у вас должен быть установлен пакет ucs LaTeX.

locale.name: ru
locale.long: Эта переменная определяет надо ли активировать каждое новое обнаруженное дополнение.

locale.name: ru
locale.long: Это список всех дополнений, которые должны включаться автоматически.

locale.name: ru
locale.long: Это список всех каталогов дополнений.

locale.name: ru
locale.long: Это список всех состояний файлов дополнений.

locale.name: ru
locale.long: Это список всех известных дополнений.

locale.name: ru
locale.long: Это значение задаёт исходные настройки для печати сначала вправо, а затем вниз. Используйте диалог настройки печати для изменения этого значения.

locale.name: ru

locale.long: Это значение определяет будут ли установки диалога печати по умолчанию применяться одновременно ко всем листам.

locale.name: ru
locale.long: This value determines whether the default setting in the Print Setup dialog is to center pages horizontally.

locale.name: ru
locale.long: Настройка GTKPrintSettings. Не исправляйте эту переменную.

locale.name: ru
locale.long: Используйте диалог настройки печати для исправления этого значения.

locale.name: ru
locale.long: Используйте диалог настройки печати для исправления этого значения.

locale.name: ru
locale.long: Используйте диалог настройки печати для исправления этого значения.

locale.name: ru

locale.name: ru

locale.name: ru
locale.long: This value determines the length of the undo chain. Each editing action has a size associate with it, to compare it with the memory requirements of a simple one-cell edit (size of 1). The undo list will be truncated when its total size exceeds this configurable value.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Действие при двойном щелчке по заголовку окна
locale.long: This option determines the effects of double-clicking on the title bar. Current valid options are 'toggle_shade', which will shade/unshade the window, 'toggle_maximize' which will maximize/unmaximize the window, 'toggle_maximize_horizontally' and 'toggle_maximize_vertically' which will maximize/unmaximize the window in that direction only, 'minimize' which will minimize the window, 'shade' which will roll the window up, 'menu' which will display the window menu, 'lower' which will put the window behind all the others, and 'none' which will not do anything.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Действие при щелчке по заголовку окна средней кнопкой мыши
locale.long: This option determines the effects of middle-clicking on the title bar. Current valid options are 'toggle_shade', which will shade/unshade the window, 'toggle_maximize' which will maximize/unmaximize the window, 'toggle_maximize_horizontally' and 'toggle_maximize_vertically' which will maximize/unmaximize the window in that direction only, 'minimize' which will minimize the window, 'shade' which will roll the window up, 'menu' which will display the window menu, 'lower' which will put the window behind all the others, and 'none' which will not do anything.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Действие при щелчке по заголовку окна правой кнопкой мыши
locale.long: This option determines the effects of right-clicking on the title bar. Current valid options are 'toggle_shade', which will shade/unshade the window, 'toggle_maximize' which will maximize/unmaximize the window, 'toggle_maximize_horizontally' and 'toggle_maximize_vertically' which will maximize/unmaximize the window in that direction only, 'minimize' which will minimize the window, 'shade' which will roll the window up, 'menu' which will display the window menu, 'lower' which will put the window behind all the others, and 'none' which will not do anything.

locale.name: C
locale.short: (Не реализовано) Навигация ведётся по приложениям, а не по окнам
locale.long: If true, then Metacity works in terms of applications rather than windows. The concept is a bit abstract, but in general an application-based setup is more like the Mac and less like Windows. When you focus a window in application-based mode, all the windows in the application will be raised. Also, in application-based mode, focus clicks are not passed through to windows in other applications. Application-based mode is, however, largely unimplemented at the moment.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Determines whether applications or the system can generate audible 'beeps'; may be used in conjunction with 'visual bell' to allow silent 'beeps'.

locale.name: C
locale.long: If set to true, and the focus mode is either "sloppy" or "mouse" then the focused window will be automatically raised after a delay specified by the auto_raise_delay key. This is not related to clicking on a window to raise it, nor to entering a window during drag-and-drop.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Задержка в миллисекундах для параметра автоматического открытия окна
locale.long: The time delay before raising a window if auto_raise is set to true. The delay is given in thousandths of a second.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Arrangement of buttons on the titlebar. The value should be a string, such as "menu:minimize,maximize,spacer,close"; the colon separates the left corner of the window from the right corner, and the button names are comma-separated. Duplicate buttons are not allowed. Unknown button names are silently ignored so that buttons can be added in future metacity versions without breaking older versions. A special spacer tag can be used to insert some space between two adjacent buttons.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Determines whether Metacity is a compositing manager.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Disable misfeatures that are required by old or broken applications
locale.long: Some applications disregard specifications in ways that result in window manager misfeatures. This option puts Metacity in a rigorously correct mode, which gives a more consistent user interface, provided one does not need to run any misbehaving applications.

locale.name: C
locale.long: The window focus mode indicates how windows are activated. It has three possible values; "click" means windows must be clicked in order to focus them, "sloppy" means windows are focused when the mouse enters the window, and "mouse" means windows are focused when the mouse enters the window and unfocused when the mouse leaves the window.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Определяет, как новое окно получает фокус
locale.long: This option provides additional control over how newly created windows get focus. It has two possible values; "smart" applies the user's normal focus mode, and "strict" results in windows started from a terminal not being given focus.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Модификатор для действий по щелчку мыши
locale.long: Clicking a window while holding down this modifier key will move the window (left click), resize the window (middle click), or show the window menu (right click). The left and right operations may be swapped using the "mouse_button_resize" key. Modifier is expressed as "<Alt>" or "<Super>" for example.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Number of workspaces. Must be more than zero, and has a fixed maximum to prevent making the desktop unusable by accidentally asking for too many workspaces.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Whether raising should be a side-effect of other user interactions
locale.long: Setting this option to false can lead to buggy behavior, so users are strongly discouraged from changing it from the default of true. Many actions (e.g. clicking in the client area, moving or resizing the window) normally raise the window as a side-effect. Setting this option to false, which is strongly discouraged, will decouple raising from other user actions, and ignore raise requests generated by applications. See http://bugzilla.gnome.org/show_bug.cgi?id=445447#c6. Even when this option is false, windows can still be raised by an alt-left-click anywhere on the window, a normal click on the window decorations, or by special messages from pagers, such as activation requests from tasklist applets. This option is currently disabled in click-to-focus mode. Note that the list of ways to raise windows when raise_on_click is false does not include programmatic requests from applications to raise windows; such requests will be ignored regardless of the reason for the request. If you are an application developer and have a user complaining that your application does not work with this setting disabled, tell them it is _their_ fault for breaking their window manager and that they need to change this option back to true or live with the "bug" they requested.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Если установлено, удобство в использовании уменьшается за для меньшего использования системных ресурсов
locale.long: If true, metacity will give the user less feedback by using wireframes, avoiding animations, or other means. This is a significant reduction in usability for many users, but may allow legacy applications to continue working, and may also be a useful tradeoff for terminal servers. However, the wireframe feature is disabled when accessibility is on.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Изменение размера с использование правой кнопки мыши
locale.long: Set this to true to resize with the right button and show a menu with the middle button while holding down the key given in "mouse_button_modifier"; set it to false to make it work the opposite way around.

locale.name: C
locale.long: The theme determines the appearance of window borders, titlebar, and so forth.

locale.name: C
locale.long: A font description string describing a font for window titlebars. The size from the description will only be used if the titlebar_font_size option is set to 0. Also, this option is disabled if the titlebar_uses_desktop_font option is set to true.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Использовать стандартный системный шрифт в заголовках окон
locale.long: If true, ignore the titlebar_font option, and use the standard application font for window titles.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Turns on a visual indication when an application or the system issues a 'bell' or 'beep'; useful for the hard-of-hearing and for use in noisy environments.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Tells Metacity how to implement the visual indication that the system bell or another application 'bell' indicator has been rung. Currently there are two valid values, "fullscreen", which causes a fullscreen white-black flash, and "frame_flash" which causes the titlebar of the application which sent the bell signal to flash. If the application which sent the bell is unknown (as is usually the case for the default "system beep"), the currently focused window's titlebar is flashed.

locale.name: C
locale.long: The format looks like "<Control>a" or "<Shift><Alt>F1". The parser is fairly liberal and allows lower or upper case, and also abbreviations such as "<Ctl>" and "<Ctrl>". If you set the option to the special string "disabled", then there will be no keybinding for this action. This keybinding may be reversed by holding down the "shift" key; therefore, "shift" cannot be one of the keys it uses.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Переключиться в обратном порядке между окнами приложения немедленно
locale.long: The format looks like "<Control>a" or "<Shift><Alt>F1". The parser is fairly liberal and allows lower or upper case, and also abbreviations such as "<Ctl>" and "<Ctrl>". If you set the option to the special string "disabled", then there will be no keybinding for this action. This keybinding may be reversed by holding down the "shift" key; therefore, "shift" cannot be one of the keys it uses.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Переключить фокус ввода между панелями и рабочим столом немедленно
locale.long: The format looks like "<Control>a" or "<Shift><Alt>F1". The parser is fairly liberal and allows lower or upper case, and also abbreviations such as "<Ctl>" and "<Ctrl>". If you set the option to the special string "disabled", then there will be no keybinding for this action. This keybinding may be reversed by holding down the "shift" key; therefore, "shift" cannot be one of the keys it uses.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Переключить обратно фокус ввода между панелями и рабочим столом немедленно
locale.long: The format looks like "<Control>a" or "<Shift><Alt>F1". The parser is fairly liberal and allows lower or upper case, and also abbreviations such as "<Ctl>" and "<Ctrl>". If you set the option to the special string "disabled", then there will be no keybinding for this action. This keybinding may be reversed by holding down the "shift" key; therefore, "shift" cannot be one of the keys it uses.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Переключить фокус ввода между окнами немедленно
locale.long: The format looks like "<Control>a" or "<Shift><Alt>F1". The parser is fairly liberal and allows lower or upper case, and also abbreviations such as "<Ctl>" and "<Ctrl>". If you set the option to the special string "disabled", then there will be no keybinding for this action. This keybinding may be reversed by holding down the "shift" key; therefore, "shift" cannot be one of the keys it uses.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Переключиться в обратном порядке между окнами немедленно
locale.long: The format looks like "<Control>a" or "<Shift><Alt>F1". The parser is fairly liberal and allows lower or upper case, and also abbreviations such as "<Ctl>" and "<Ctrl>". If you set the option to the special string "disabled", then there will be no keybinding for this action. This keybinding may be reversed by holding down the "shift" key; therefore, "shift" cannot be one of the keys it uses.

locale.name: C
locale.long: The format looks like "<Control>a" or "<Shift><Alt>F1". The parser is fairly liberal and allows lower or upper case, and also abbreviations such as "<Ctl>" and "<Ctrl>". If you set the option to the special string "disabled", then there will be no keybinding for this action.

locale.name: C
locale.long: The format looks like "<Control>a" or "<Shift><Alt>F1". The parser is fairly liberal and allows lower or upper case, and also abbreviations such as "<Ctl>" and "<Ctrl>". If you set the option to the special string "disabled", then there will be no keybinding for this action.

locale.name: C
locale.long: The keybinding that runs the correspondingly-numbered command in /apps/metacity/keybinding_commands The format looks like "<Control>a" or "<Shift><Alt>F1". The parser is fairly liberal and allows lower or upper case, and also abbreviations such as "<Ctl>" and "<Ctrl>". locale.short: Значок домашней папки присутствует на рабочем столе
locale.long: If this is set to true, an icon linking to the home folder will be put on the desktop.

locale.name: C
locale.long: This name can be set if you want a custom name for the network servers icon on the desktop.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Значок «Сетевые серверы» присутствует на рабочем столе
locale.long: If this is set to true, an icon linking to the Network Servers view will be put on the desktop.

locale.name: C
locale.long: An integer specifying how parts of overlong file names should be replaced by ellipses on the desktop. If the number is larger than 0, the file name will not exceed the given number of lines. If the number is 0 or smaller, no limit is imposed on the number of displayed lines.

locale.name: C
locale.long: This name can be set if you want a custom name for the trash icon on the desktop.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Значок корзины присутствует на рабочем столе
locale.long: If this is set to true, an icon linking to the trash will be put on the desktop.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Показывать подсоединённые тома на рабочем столе
locale.long: If this is set to true, icons linking to mounted volumes will be put on the desktop.

locale.name: C
locale.long: A list of captions below an icon in the icon view and the desktop. The actual number of captions shown depends on the zoom level. Possible values are: "size", "type", "date_modified", "date_changed", "date_accessed", "owner", "group", "permissions", "octal_permissions" and "mime_type".

locale.name: C
locale.short: Использовать обратный порядок сортировки для новых окон
locale.long: If true, files in new windows will be sorted in reverse order. ie, if sorted by name, then instead of sorting the files from "a" to "z", they will be sorted from "z" to "a"; if sorted by size, instead of being incrementally they will be sorted decrementally.

locale.name: C
locale.long: The default sort-order for items in the icon view. Possible values are "name", "size", "type", "modification_date", and "emblems".

locale.name: C
locale.short: Использовать ручное размещение значков в новых окнах
locale.long: If true, new windows will use manual layout by default.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Использовать плотное размещение значков в новых окнах
locale.long: If true, icons will be laid out tighter by default in new windows.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Default zoom level used by the icon view.

locale.name: C
locale.long: If true, labels will be placed beside icons rather than underneath them.

locale.name: C
locale.long: A string specifying how parts of overlong file names should be replaced by ellipses, depending on the zoom level. Each of the list entries is of the form "Zoom Level:Integer". For each specified zoom level, if the given integer is larger than 0, the file name will not exceed the given number of lines. If the integer is 0 or smaller, no limit is imposed on the specified zoom level. A default entry of the form "Integer" without any specified zoom level is also allowed. It defines the maximum number of lines for all other zoom levels. Examples: 0 - always display overlong file names; 3 - shorten file names if they exceed three lines; smallest:5,smaller:4,0 - shorten file names if they exceed five lines for zoom level "smallest". Shorten file names if they exceed four lines for zoom level "smaller". Do not shorten file names for other zoom levels. Available zoom levels: smallest (33%), smaller (50%), small (66%), standard (100%), large (150%), larger (200%), largest (400%)

locale.name: C
locale.long: The default size of an icon for a thumbnail in the icon view.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Default column order in the list view.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Использовать обратный порядок сортировки для новых окон
locale.long: If true, files in new windows will be sorted in reverse order. ie, if sorted by name, then instead of sorting the files from "a" to "z", they will be sorted from "z" to "a".

locale.name: C
locale.long: The default sort-order for the items in the list view. Possible values are "name", "size", "type", and "modification_date".

locale.name: C
locale.long: Default list of columns visible in the list view.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Default zoom level used by the list view.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Включить классическое поведение Nautilus (все окна — обозреватели)
locale.long: If set to true, then all Nautilus windows will be browser windows. This is how Nautilus used to behave before version 2.6, and some people prefer this behavior.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Всегда использовать адресную строку вместо панели
locale.long: If set to true, then Nautilus browser windows will always use a textual input entry for the location toolbar, instead of the pathbar.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Color for the default folder background. Only used if background_set is true.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Имя файла для фона по умолчанию
locale.long: Filename for the default folder background. Only used if background_set is true.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Установлен ли пользовательский фон по умолчанию для папок.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Тип щелчка, используемый для запуска/открытия файлов
locale.long: Possible values are "single" to launch files on a single click, or "double" to launch them on a double click.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Надо ли запрашивать подтверждение при удалении файлов или очистке корзины
locale.long: If set to true, then Nautilus will ask for confirmation when you attempt to delete files, or empty the Trash.

locale.name: C
locale.long: The format of file dates. Possible values are "locale", "iso", and "informal".

locale.name: C
locale.long: When a folder is visited this viewer is used unless you have selected another view for that particular folder. Possible values are "list_view", "icon_view" and "compact_view".

locale.name: ru
locale.long: The font description used for the icons on the desktop.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Использовать домашнюю папку пользователя в качестве рабочего стола
locale.long: If set to true, then Nautilus will use the user's home folder as the desktop. If it is false, then it will use ~/Desktop as the desktop.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Максимальное количество обрабатываемых файлов в папке
locale.long: Folders over this size will be truncated to around this size. The purpose of this is to avoid unintentionally blowing the heap and killing Nautilus on massive folders. A negative value denotes no limit. The limit is approximate due to the reading of folders chunk-wise.

locale.name: C
locale.long: If set to true, then Nautilus will have a feature allowing you to delete a file immediately and in-place, instead of moving it to the trash. This feature can be dangerous, so use caution.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Что делать с исполняемыми текстовыми файлами при их активизации
locale.long: What to do with executable text files when they are activated (single or double clicked). Possible values are "launch" to launch them as programs, "ask" to ask what to do via a dialog, and "display" to display them as text files.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Завершение работы Nautilus после закрытия последнего окна.
locale.long: If set to true, then Nautilus will exit when all windows are destroyed. This is the default setting. If set to false, it can be started without any window, so nautilus can serve as a daemon to monitor media automount, or similar tasks.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Вызывать программу установки пакетов для известных типов MIME
locale.long: Whether to show the user a package installer dialog in case an unknown mime type is opened, in order to search for an application to handle it.

locale.name: C
locale.long: If set to true, then Nautilus will automatically mount media such as user-visible hard disks and removable media on start-up and media insertion.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Надо ли автоматически открывать папку автоприсоединённого носителя
locale.long: If set to true, then Nautilus will automatically open a folder when media is automounted. This only applies to media where no known x-content/* type was detected; for media where a known x-content type is detected, the user configurable action will be taken instead.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Никогда не спрашивать и не запускать программы при вставке носителей
locale.long: If set to true, then Nautilus will never prompt nor autorun/autostart programs when a medium is inserted.

locale.name: C
locale.long: List of x-content/* types for which the user have chosen "Do Nothing" in the preference capplet. No prompt will be shown nor will any matching application be started on insertion of media matching these types.

locale.name: C
locale.long: List of x-content/* types for which the user have chosen "Open Folder" in the preferences capplet. A folder window will be opened on insertion of media matching these types.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Типы x-content/* для которых будет открыто предпочитаемое приложение
locale.long: List of x-content/* types for which the user have chosen to start an application in the preference capplet. The preferred application for the given type will be started on insertion on media matching these types.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Кнопка мыши для активации команды «Назад» в окне обозревателя
locale.long: For users with mice that have buttons for "Forward" and "Back", this key will set which button activates the "Back" command in a browser window. Possible values range between 6 and 14.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Кнопка мыши для активации команды «Вперёд» в окне обозревателя
locale.long: For users with mice that have buttons for "Forward" and "Back", this key will set which button activates the "Forward" command in a browser window. Possible values range between 6 and 14.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Использовать события дополнительных кнопок мыши в окне обозревателя Nautilus
locale.long: For users with mice that have "Forward" and "Back" buttons, this key will determine if any action is taken inside of Nautilus when either is pressed.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Воспроизводить ли образец звука при наведении мыши на значок
locale.long: Speed tradeoff for when to preview a sound file when mousing over a files icon. If set to "always" then always plays the sound, even if the file is on a remote server. If set to "local_only" then only plays previews on local file systems. If set to "never" then it never previews sound.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Criteria when matching files searched for in the search bar. If set to "search_by_text", then Nautilus will Search for files by file name only. If set to "search_by_text_and_properties", then Nautilus will search for files by file name and file properties.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Показывать расширенные права доступа в диалоге свойств файла
locale.long: If set to true, then Nautilus lets you edit and display file permissions in a more unix-like way, accessing some more esoteric options.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Использовать Nautilus для отрисовки рабочего стола
locale.long: If set to true, then Nautilus will draw the icons on the desktop.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Показывать ли количество объектов в папке
locale.long: Speed tradeoff for when to show the number of items in a folder. If set to "always" then always show item counts, even if the folder is on a remote server. If set to "local_only" then only show counts for local file systems. If set to "never" then never bother to compute item counts.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Показывать ли текст файла в значках
locale.long: Speed tradeoff for when to show a preview of text file contents in the file's icon. If set to "always" then always show previews, even if the folder is on a remote server. If set to "local_only" then only show previews for local file systems. If set to "never" then never bother to read preview data.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Показывать ли миниатюры для файлов изображений
locale.long: Speed tradeoff for when to show an image file as a thumbnail. If set to "always" then always thumbnail, even if the folder is on a remote server. If set to "local_only" then only show thumbnails for local file systems. If set to "never" then never bother to thumbnail images, just use a generic icon.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Цвет фона боковой панели по умолчанию
locale.long: Filename for the default side pane background. Only used if side_pane_background_set is true.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Имя файла фона боковой панели по умолчанию
locale.long: Filename for the default side pane background. Only used if side_pane_background_set is true.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Установлен ли пользовательский фон по умолчанию для боковой панели.

locale.name: C
locale.long: The side pane view to show in newly opened windows.

locale.name: C
locale.long: The default width of the side pane in new windows.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Показывать папки перед файлами в окнах
locale.long: If set to true, then Nautilus shows folders prior to showing files in the icon and list views.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Показывать строку адреса в новых окнах
locale.long: If set to true, newly opened windows will have the location bar visible.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Показывать боковую панель в новых окнах
locale.long: If set to true, newly opened windows will have the side pane visible.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Показывать строку состояния в новых окнах
locale.long: If set to true, newly opened windows will have the status bar visible.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Показывать панель инструментов в новых окнах
locale.long: If set to true, newly opened windows will have toolbars visible.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Name of the Nautilus theme to use. This has been deprecated as of Nautilus 2.2. Please use the icon theme instead.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Максимальный размер изображения для построения миниатюр
locale.long: Images over this size (in bytes) won't be thumbnailed. The purpose of this setting is to avoid thumbnailing large images that may take a long time to load or use lots of memory.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Показывать только папки в боковой панели «Дерево»
locale.long: If set to true, Nautilus will only show folders in the tree side pane. Otherwise it will show both folders and files.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Whether opening a terminal on the desktop opens a terminal in the home directory
locale.long: If set to true, then opening a terminal on the desktop will open a terminal in the home directory. Otherwise, it will be opened in the desktop directory. Note that this key is irrelevant if the desktop directory is identical to the home directory.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Whether a Midnight Commander menu item should be displayed
locale.long: If set to true, and if the terminal file manager "Midnight Commander" is installed, then an "Open in Midnight Commander" menu item will be displayed in the context menu.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Set this to TRUE to disable notifications when connecting to a network.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Set this to TRUE to disable notifications when disconnecting from a network.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Used to determine whether settings should be migrated to a new version.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Set this to TRUE to disable notifications when wireless networks are available.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Enable the scanning mode.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Vertical size of the keyboard area of onboard.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Horizontal position of the upper-left corner of onboard on the screen.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Name of the file with the current layout.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Length of the pause between two steps in scanning mode.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Text lines for the snippet keys
locale.long: Define the text line that corresponds to each snippet key.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Start onboard with a minimized window.
locale.long: Do not display the onboard window on start; start onboard minimized.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Use trayicon instead of the classic minimize.
locale.long: Display an icon in the notification area to hide and show onboard.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Horizontal position of the upper-left corner of onboard on the screen.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Horizontal size of the keyboard area of onboard.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Vertical size in pixel of the icon palette.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Horizontal position of the icon palette.
locale.long: Horizontal position of the icon palette on the screen.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Show icon palette when onboard is minimized.
locale.long: Display a floating icon when onboard is minimized. By clicking on it, onboard reappears.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Vertical position of the icon palette.
locale.long: Horizontal position of the icon palette on the screen.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Horizontal size in pixel of the icon palette.

locale.name: C
locale.long: A list of panel applet IDs. Each ID identifies an individual panel applet. The settings for each of these applets are stored in /apps/panel/applets/$(id).

locale.name: C
locale.long: If true, autocompletion in the "Run Application" dialog is made available.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Включить список программ в диалоге «Выполнить программу»
locale.long: If true, the "Known Applications" listing in the "Run Application" dialog is made available. Whether or not the listing is expanded when the dialog is shown is controlled by the show_program_list key.

locale.name: C
locale.long: A list of panel object IDs. Each ID identifies an individual panel object (e.g. a launcher, action button or menu button/bar). The settings for each of these objects are stored in /apps/panel/objects/$(id).

locale.name: C
locale.long: A boolean flag to indicate whether the user's previous configuration in /apps/panel/profiles/default has been copied to the new location in /apps/panel.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Разворачивать список программ в диалоге «Выполнить программу»
locale.long: If true, the "Known Applications" listing in the "Run Application" dialog is expanded when the dialog is opened. This key is only relevant if the enable_program_list key is true.

locale.name: C
locale.long: A list of panel IDs. Each ID identifies an individual toplevel panel. The settings for each of these panels are stored in /apps/panel/toplevels/$(id).

locale.name: C
locale.long: If true, a dialog is shown asking for confirmation if the user wants to remove a panel.

locale.name: C
locale.long: If true, the panel will not allow a user to force an application to quit by removing access to the force quit button.

locale.name: C
locale.long: This key is deprecated as it cannot be used to implement proper lockdown. The /desktop/gnome/lockdown/disable_lock_screen key should be used instead.

locale.name: C
locale.long: If true, the panel will not allow a user to log out, by removing access to the log out menu entries.

locale.name: C
locale.long: A list of applet IIDs that the panel will ignore. This way you can disable certain applets from loading or showing up in the menu. For example to disable the mini-commander applet add 'OAFIID:GNOME_MiniCommanderApplet' to this list. The panel must be restarted for this to take effect.

locale.name: C
locale.long: If true, a drawer will automatically be closed when the user clicks a launcher in it.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Подсвечивать кнопки запуска при наведении мыши
locale.long: If true, a launcher is highlighted when the user moves the pointer over it.

locale.name: C
locale.long: If true, the panel will not allow any changes to the configuration of the panel. Individual applets may need to be locked down separately however. The panel must be restarted for this to take effect.

locale.name: C
locale.long: If true, tooltips are shown for objects in panels.

locale.name: C
locale.long: The action type this button represents. Possible values are "lock", "logout", "run", "search" and "screenshot". This key is only relevant if the object_type key is "action-applet".

locale.name: C
locale.long: The identifier of the panel attached to this drawer. This key is only relevant if the object_type key is "drawer-object".

locale.name: C
locale.long: The Bonobo implementation ID of the applet - e.g. "OAFIID:GNOME_ClockApplet". This key is only relevant if the object_type key is "bonobo-applet".

locale.name: C
locale.long: The location of the image file used as the icon for the object's button. This key is only relevant if the object_type key is "drawer-object" or "menu-object" and the use_custom_icon key is true.

locale.name: C
locale.long: The location of the .desktop file describing the launcher. This key is only relevant if the object_type key is "launcher-object".

locale.name: C
locale.long: If true, the user may not move the applet without first unlocking the object using the "Unlock" menuitem.

locale.name: C
locale.long: The path from which the menu contents is contructed. This key is only relevant if the use_menu_path key is true and the object_type key is "menu-object".

locale.name: C
locale.long: The type of this panel object. Possible values are "drawer-object", "menu-object", "launcher-object", "bonobo-applet", "action-applet" and "menu-bar".

locale.name: C
locale.long: If true, the position of the object is interpreted relative to the right (or bottom if vertical) edge of the panel.

locale.name: C
locale.long: The position of this panel object. The position is specified by the number of pixels from the left (or top if vertical) panel edge.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Всплывающая подсказка для ящика или меню
locale.long: The text to display in a tooltip for this drawer or this menu. This key is only relevant if the object_type key is "drawer-object" or "menu-object".

locale.name: C
locale.long: The identifier of the toplevel panel which contains this object.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Использовать другой значок для кнопки объекта
locale.long: If true, the custom_icon key is used as a custom icon for the button. If false, the custom_icon key is ignored. This key is only relevant if the object_type key is "menu-object" or "drawer-object".

locale.name: C
locale.short: Использовать другой путь к содержимому меню
locale.long: If true, the menu_path key is used as the path from which the menu contents should be constructed. If false, the menu_path key is ignored. This key is only relevant if the object_type key is "menu-object".

locale.name: C
locale.long: The speed in which panel animations should occur. Possible values are "slow", "medium" and "fast". This key is only relevant if the enable_animations key is true.

locale.name: C
locale.long: If true, the panel is automatically hidden into a corner of the screen when the pointer leaves the panel area. Moving the pointer to that corner again will cause the panel to re-appear.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Specifies the number of pixels visible when the panel is automatically hidden into a corner. This key is only relevant if the auto_hide key is true.

locale.name: C
locale.long: If true, hiding and un-hiding of this panel will be animated rather than happening instantly.

locale.name: C
locale.long: If true, arrows will be placed on the hide buttons. This key is only relevant if the enable_buttons key is true.

locale.name: C
locale.long: If true, buttons will be placed on each side of the panel which may be used to move the panel to edge of the screen, leaving only a button showing.

locale.name: C
locale.long: If true, the panel will occupy the entire screen width (height if this is a vertical panel). In this mode the panel can only be placed at a screen edge. If false, the panel will only be large enough to accommodate the applets, launchers and buttons on the panel.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Specifies the number of milliseconds delay after the pointer leaves the panel area before the panel is automatically hidden. This key is only relevant if the auto_hide key is true.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Монитор в режиме Xinerama, на котором будет отображена панель
locale.long: In a Xinerama setup, you may have panels on each individual monitor. This key identifies the current monitor the panel is displayed on.

locale.name: C
locale.long: This is a human readable name which you can use to identify a panel. Its main purpose is to serve as the panel's window title which is useful when navigating between panels.

locale.name: C
locale.long: The orientation of the panel. Possible values are "top", "bottom", "left", "right". In expanded mode the key specifies which screen edge the panel is on. In un-expanded mode the difference between "top" and "bottom" is less important - both indicate that this is a horizontal panel - but still give a useful hint as to how some panel objects should behave. For example, on a "top" panel a menu button will pop up its menu below the panel, whereas on a "bottom" panel the menu will be popped up above the panel.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Экран в системе X Window, на котором показывается панель
locale.long: With a multi-screen setup, you may have panels on each individual screen. This key identifies the current screen the panel is displayed on.

locale.name: C
locale.long: The height (width for a vertical panel) of the panel. The panel will determine at runtime a minimum size based on the font size and other indicators. The maximum size is fixed at one quarter of the screen height (or width).

locale.name: C
locale.long: Specifies the number of milliseconds delay after the pointer enters the panel area before the panel is automatically re-shown. This key is only relevant if the auto_hide key is true.

locale.name: C
locale.long: The location of the panel along the x-axis. This key is only relevant in un-expanded mode. In expanded mode this key is ignored and the panel is placed at the screen edge specified by the orientation key.

locale.name: C
locale.long: If true, the x and x_right keys are ignored and the panel is placed at the center of the x-axis of the screen. If the panel is resized it will remain at that position - i.e. the panel will grow on both sides. If false, the x and x_right keys specify the location of the panel.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Координата панели по горизонтальной оси X, считая от правого края экрана
locale.long: The location of the panel along the x-axis, starting from the right of the screen. If set to -1, the value is ignored and the value of the x key is used. If the value is greater than 0, then the value of the x key is ignored. This key is only relevant in un-expanded mode. In expanded mode this key is ignored and the panel is placed at the screen edge specified by the orientation key.

locale.name: C
locale.long: The location of the panel along the y-axis. This key is only relevant in un-expanded mode. In expanded mode this key is ignored and the panel is placed at the screen edge specified by the orientation key.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Координата панели по вертикальной оси Y, считая от нижнего края экрана
locale.long: The location of the panel along the y-axis, starting from the bottom of the screen. If set to -1, the value is ignored and the value of the y key is used. If the value is greater than 0, then the value of the y key is ignored. This key is only relevant in un-expanded mode. In expanded mode this key is ignored and the panel is placed at the screen edge specified by the orientation key.

locale.name: C
locale.long: If true, the y and y_bottom keys are ignored and the panel is placed at the center of the y-axis of the screen. If the panel is resized it will remain at that position - i.e. the panel will grow on both sides. If false, the y and y_bottom keys specify the location of the panel.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Specifies the background color for the panel in #RGB format.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Подгонять размер изображения под размер панели
locale.long: If true, the image will be scaled (retaining the aspect ratio of the image) to the panel height (if horizontal).

locale.name: C
locale.long: Specifies the file to be used for the background image. If the image contains an alpha channel it will be composited onto the desktop background image.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Specifies the opacity of the background color format. If the color is not completely opaque (a value of less than 65535), the color will be composited onto the desktop background image.

locale.name: C
locale.long: If true, the background image will be rotated when the panel is oriented vertically.

locale.name: C
locale.long: If true, the image will be scaled to the panel dimensions. The aspect ratio of the image will not be maintained.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Which type of background should be used for this panel. Possible values are "gtk" - the default GTK+ widget background will be used, "color" - the color key will be used as background color or "image" - the image specified by the image key will be used as background.

locale.name: ru
locale.short: Кнопка мыши, используемая для захвата указателя
locale.long: Эта кнопка мыши должна быть нажата для захвата указателя в области захвата. Возможные значения: "1" — левая кнопка мыши, "2" — средняя кнопка мыши и "3" — правая кнопка мыши.

locale.name: ru
locale.short: Захватывать указатель, только если нажата клавиша Alt
locale.long: Должна ли быть нажата клавиша Alt, для того, чтобы указатель был захвачен, когда он находиться в области захвата. Если этот параметр установлен и и установлена кнопка мыши в параметре "capture_button" для захвата указателя необходимо нажать также Alt в то время, когда удерживается эта кнопка мыши.

locale.name: ru
locale.short: Захватывать указатель, только если нажата клавиша Ctrl
locale.long: Должна ли быть нажата клавиша Ctrl, для того, чтобы указатель был захвачен, когда он находиться в области захвата. Если этот параметр установлен и и установлена кнопка мыши в параметре "capture_button" для захвата указателя необходимо нажать также Ctrl в то время, когда удерживается эта кнопка мыши.

locale.name: ru
locale.short: Захватывать указатель, только если нажата клавиша Shift
locale.long: Должна ли быть нажата клавиша Shift, для того, чтобы указатель был захвачен, когда он находиться в области захвата. Если этот параметр установлен и и установлена кнопка мыши в параметре "capture_button" для захвата указателя необходимо нажать также Shift в то время, когда удерживается эта кнопка мыши.

locale.name: ru
locale.short: Кнопка мыши, используемая для освобождения указателя
locale.long: Эта кнопка мыши должна быть нажата для освобождения указателя из области захвата. Возможные значения: "1" — левая кнопка мыши, "2" — средняя кнопка мыши и "3" — правая кнопка мыши.

locale.long: Требуется ли зажимать клавишу Alt одновременно с кнопкой мыши "release_button" для того, чтобы указатель был освобождён из области захвата.

locale.long: Требуется ли зажимать клавишу Ctrl одновременно с кнопкой мыши "release_button" для того, чтобы указатель был освобождён из области захвата.

locale.long: Требуется ли зажимать клавишу Shift одновременно с кнопкой мыши "release_button" для того, чтобы указатель был освобождён из области захвата.
